name: War on Drugs VR
description:
War on Drugs VR is a virtual reality sandbox game with both casual and story driven elements. It will feature two game modes, one where you have to get rid off all the drug gangs in the city, and the second is a story driven game mode.

- Solve mysteries in an open world
- find clues
- use the clues in conjunction with other items in the world
- fight off gangs
- hack things in the city
- heists!
